december.overview: The year concludes with Jupiter's final benefic aspects to your sign, cementing the spiritual growth and manifestations you've achieved. Sagittarius season expands your philosophical horizons and global connections.
december.love: Holiday season brings magical romantic moments and possibly long-distance love connections. Your expanded spiritual awareness attracts partners who match your evolved consciousness.
december.career: International opportunities or higher learning possibilities emerge as Jupiter completes its favorable cycle. Your wisdom and intuitive insights are recognized on a larger scale.
december.health: End the year with gratitude practices and spiritual reflection. Your journey through 2026 has strengthened both your psychic abilities and your physical resilience.
